name: mathnet
description: Guidance for Math.NET Numerics library for .NET. USE FOR: linear algebra (matrices, vectors, decompositions), statistics (descriptive, distributions, regression), numerical integration, interpolation, random number generation, signal processing. DO NOT USE FOR: symbolic math (use AngouriMath), expression parsing from strings (use NCalc), machine learning models (use ML.NET), GPU-accelerated computation.
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick
